column5: Many from the WC community will be going north over the next several days for the opening week of the walleye season in Canada. Just wanted to say, Happy Traveling. Take time to be safe on the road. The fish will be there whenever you arrive. Have a great week on the water. And, be sure to post a report when you get home! In fact, it would help me survive until my departure in two weeks if someone fishing out of one of the camps that has added WiFi access would report sooner!Enjoy....
